scripts.dev:server: npm run build:tsoa && cross-env NODE_ENV=development sls offline start --stage offline
scripts.prepare-for-running: npm run build:tsoa && npm run build:clients
scripts.build:tsoa: rm -rf spec-and-routes && rm -rf dist && rm -rf .build && rm -rf tsoa &&  mkdir -p ./src/generated && mkdir -p ./src/generated/routes && mkdir -p ./src/generated/swagger && tsoa spec-and-routes
scripts.build:clients: rm -rf ./client &&  cd ./tools/openapi && openapi-generator-cli generate  -g typescript-fetch -i ../../src/generated/swagger/swagger.json -c ./config.json -o ../../client && cd ../../client && npm run build
